elements.name: help
elements.desc: Show the list of commands, their descriptions and syntax.

elements.name: update
elements.desc: Update the software to the latest version.

elements.name: install
elements.desc: Add and configures the package. Usage ConfigManager install package-name.

elements.name: remove
elements.desc: Remove the package if it exists. Usage ConfigManager remove package-name

elements.name: exists
elements.desc: Check if the package exists. Usage ConfigManager exists package-name

elements.name: version
elements.desc: Display the current version of the package.
